Title: Private Worlds
Cast: Claudette Colbert, Charles Boyer, Joan Bennett, Helen Vinson, Joel McCrea, Jean Rouverol, Esther Dale, Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams, Dora Clement, Sam Godfrey, Samuel S. Hinds, Theodore von Eltz, Stanley Andrews, Maurice Murphy, Eleanore King
Plot: The work of a progressive female psychiatrist and her colleague at a mental hospital is threatened by the arrival of a conservative new supervisor, who disapproves of both her methods and the fact that she is a woman in a "man's field." Location: General Service Studios - 1040 N. Las Palmas, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA

Writer: Lynn Starling (screenplay), Gregory La Cava (screenplay) | 2 more credits »
Description: Directed by Gregory La Cava.  With Claudette Colbert, Charles Boyer, Joan Bennett, Helen Vinson. The work of a progressive female psychiatrist and her colleague at a mental hospital is threatened by the arrival of a conservative new supervisor, who disapproves of both her methods and the fact that she is a woman in a "man's field."
